Articles.Content:
To me the orange parachute seemed random and didn't seem to fit with the Kerbal Space Program very well, so I reskinned it to fit with KSP's logo and colors.

Here is the texture file if you are interested:

Just save the picture and copy it to KSP/Parts/parachute_single
Nice. I'm gonna use this in my game from now on.

Haha, thoughtful reskin. I'm switching it now.

By the way to anyone downloading. Rename the picture to 'parachutes_texMap.' Or re-refer this in the cfg.
